00035 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::ClientBufferedReaderHandler(
00036     DfsBroker::Client *client, uint32_t fd, uint32_t buf_size,
00037     uint32_t outstanding, uint64_t start_offset, uint64_t end_offset) :
00038     m_client(client), m_fd(fd), m_read_size(buf_size), m_eof(false),
00039     m_error(Error::OK) {
00040 
00041   m_max_outstanding = outstanding;
00042   m_end_offset = end_offset;
00043   m_outstanding_offset = start_offset;
00044   m_actual_offset = start_offset;
00045 
00049   if (start_offset > 0) {
00050     try { m_client->seek(m_fd, start_offset); }
00051     catch (...) {
00052       m_eof = true;
00053       throw;
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   {
00058     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00059     uint32_t toread;
00060 
00061     for (m_outstanding=0; m_outstanding<m_max_outstanding; m_outstanding++) {
00062       if (m_end_offset && (m_end_offset-m_outstanding_offset) < m_read_size) {
00063         if ((toread = (uint32_t)(m_end_offset - m_outstanding_offset)) == 0)
00064           break;
00065       }
00066       else
00067         toread = m_read_size;
00068 
00069       try { m_client->read(m_fd, toread, this); }
00070       catch (...) {
00071         m_eof = true;
00072         throw;
00073       }
00074       m_outstanding_offset -= toread;
00075     }
00076     m_ptr = m_end_ptr = 0;
00077   }
00078 }

00082 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::~ClientBufferedReaderHandler() {
00083   try {
00084     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00085     m_eof = true;
00086 
00087     while (m_outstanding > 0)
00088       m_cond.wait(lock);
00089   }
00090   catch (...) {
00091     HT_ERROR("synchronization error");
00092   }
00093 }

00100 void ClientBufferedReaderHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00101   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00102 
00103   m_outstanding--;
00104 
00105   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00106     if ((m_error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00107       m_error_msg = Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr);
00108       HT_ERRORF("DFS read error (amount=%u, fd=%d) : %s",
00109                 m_read_size, m_fd, m_error_msg.c_str());
00110       m_eof = true;
00111       m_cond.notify_all();
00112       return;
00113     }
00114     m_queue.push(event_ptr);
00115 
00116     uint64_t offset;
00117     size_t amount = Client::decode_response_read_header(event_ptr, &offset);
00118     m_actual_offset += amount;
00119 
00120     if (amount < m_read_size) {
00121       m_eof = true;
00122     }
00123   }
00124   else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00125     m_error_msg = event_ptr->to_str();
00126     HT_ERRORF("%s", m_error_msg.c_str());
00127     m_error = event_ptr->error;
00128     m_eof = true;
00129   }
00130   else {
00131     m_error_msg = event_ptr->to_str();
00132     HT_ERRORF("%s", m_error_msg.c_str());
00133     m_error = Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION;
00134     m_eof = true;
00135   }
00136 
00137   m_cond.notify_all();
00138 }

00145 size_t
00146 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::read(void *buf, size_t len) {
00147   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00148   uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)buf;
00149   long nleft = len;
00150   long available, nread;
00151 
00152   while (true) {
00153 
00154     while (m_queue.empty() && !m_eof)
00155       m_cond.wait(lock);
00156 
00157     if (m_error != Error::OK)
00158       HT_THROW(m_error, m_error_msg);
00159 
00160     if (m_queue.empty())
00161       HT_THROW(Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION, "empty queue");
00162 
00163     if (m_ptr == 0) {
00164       uint64_t offset;
00165       uint32_t amount;
00166       EventPtr &event_ptr = m_queue.front();
00167       amount = Client::decode_response_read_header(event_ptr, &offset, &m_ptr);
00168       m_end_ptr = m_ptr + amount;
00169     }
00170 
00171     available = m_end_ptr - m_ptr;
00172 
00173     if (available >= nleft) {
00174       memcpy(ptr, m_ptr, nleft);
00175       nread = len;
00176       m_ptr += nleft;
00177       if ((m_end_ptr - m_ptr) == 0) {
00178         m_queue.pop();
00179         m_ptr = 0;
00180         read_ahead();
00181       }
00182       break;
00183     }
00184     else if (available == 0) {
00185       if (m_eof && m_queue.size() == 1) {
00186         m_queue.pop();
00187         m_ptr = m_end_ptr = 0;
00188         nread = len - nleft;
00189         break;
00190       }
00191     }
00192 
00193     memcpy(ptr, m_ptr, available);
00194     ptr += available;
00195     nleft -= available;
00196     m_queue.pop();
00197     m_ptr = 0;
00198     read_ahead();
00199   }
00200 
00201   return nread;
00202 }

00205 
00209 void ClientBufferedReaderHandler::read_ahead() {
00210   uint32_t n = m_max_outstanding - (m_outstanding + m_queue.size());
00211   uint32_t toread;
00212 
00213   HT_ASSERT(m_max_outstanding >= (m_outstanding + m_queue.size()));
00214 
00215   if (m_eof)
00216     return;
00217 
00218   for (uint32_t i=0; i<n; i++) {
00219     if (m_end_offset && (m_end_offset-m_outstanding_offset) < m_read_size) {
00220       if ((toread = (uint32_t)(m_end_offset - m_outstanding_offset)) == 0)
00221         break;
00222     }
00223     else
00224       toread = m_read_size;
00225 
00226     try { m_client->read(m_fd, toread, this); }
00227     catch(...) {
00228       m_eof = true;
00229       throw;
00230     }
00231     m_outstanding++;
00232     m_outstanding_offset -= toread;
00233   }
00234 }
